mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATE_DATE, SEAT, TIME, MOVIE_ID, ID) VALUES (#{date}, #{seat}, #{time}, #{mvId}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION.RESERVATE_DATE, RESERVATION.SEAT, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE FROM RESERVATION INNER JOIN MOVIE ON RESERVATION.MOVIE_ID = MOVIE.MOVIE_ID WHERE RESERVATION.ID = #{id}
